ResourceHeader.ResourceName: STEREO-A SWAVES One minute Time Domain Sampler Data

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added PublicationInfo. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB
Added MetadataRightsList and RightsList(s). Updated to 2.7.1. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description:
The two STEREO radio receivers measure wave intensity, source direction and angular size in the frequency 
	  range 40 kHz to 16 MHz, corresponding to heliocentric source distances of about 1 Rs to 1 AU. One 10-40 kHz 
	  receiver measures radio and plasma waves near the 1 AU electron plasma frequency. One receiver makes high 
	  time resolution measurements at 50 MHz. Time Domain Samplers make simultaneous wideband waveform measurements 
	  on three electric components at 250,000 samples/second. Antenna systems include three mutually orthogonal 6-meter monopoles.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: National Aeronautics and Space Administration; Dr. Jean-Louis Henry Bougeret

Parameter.Name: Time, ms of day
Parameter.Description: Millisecond of the day. The filename provides the date.

Parameter.Name: Ex
Parameter.Description: Electric field in the X direction.

Parameter.Name: Ey
Parameter.Description: Electric field in the Y direction.

Parameter.Name: Ez
Parameter.Description: Electric field in the Z direction.

Parameter.Name: E1 - E2
Parameter.Description: Electric field of antenna 1 minus the electric field of antenna 2 (antennas 1 and 2 vary in pseudo-dipole mode).
